section.title:
Implementing an expandable ListView
ExpandableListView
The `ExpandableListView` is similar to `ListView` but allow you to define groups and details for this group. `ExpandableListView` expects and adapter of type `BaseExpandableListAdapter` .
In this case you have to define two layouts, one for the group and another one for the details row.
ExpandableListView example In the following example you create an expandable listview similar to the following screenshot.
Screenshot of ExpandableListView
Create a project called _com.vogella.android.listview.expandable_ with the activity called `MainActivity` .
Create or adjust the following layout files. First _layout/activity_main.xml_ .
Afterwards create _layout/listrow_group.xml_ .
The last required layout is _layout/listrow_details.xml_ .
